_Metric_Desc: percent of running production code can be directly traced back to automated security and quality tests that verify the compliance of each build.
percent coverage for application vulnerability remediation across the production code.
percent of critical or high vulnerabilities fixed or marked as accepted within the time specified by policy (have an age greater than the policy defined maximum age).
percent of critical systems that passed Business Continuity Management and Operational Resilience (CCMv4 domain BCR) tests.
percent of all assets have change management technology integrated.
percent of positive test results from all configuration tests performed.
percent of cryptographic modules continue to be up to approved standards.
percent of assets with cryptographic functions meet the organization's defined cryptographic requirements.
percent of managed assets are cataloged and tracked to detected assets.
percent of data assets classified according to the data classification policies specific to the organization.
percent (ratio) of assets in the asset catalog classified according to the data classification policies specific to each organization.
percent of records from the data inventory required by control DSP-03 included in data flow documentation.
percent of data streams from the data inventory required by control DSP-03 are included in the data flow documentation.
percent active policy exceptions where the time to resolution is within the documented timeline for resolution. (the effectiveness of governance exception handling processes).
percent of users leaving the organization are deprovisioned from the identity management system in compliance with identity and access management policies.
percent of time elapsed since the last recertification for all types of privileges (including user roles, group memberships, read/write/ execute permissions to files/databases/scripts/jobs, etc).
percent of users with production access have admin access (duties segregated).
percent of data flows use an approved, standardized cryptographic security function for interoperable transmissions of data.

percent of logs configured to generate security alerts for anomalous activity across control domains.
percent of discovered anomalies resolved within required timelines  (effective log monitoring and response process).
percent of cryptography, encryption, and key management controls have defined metrics.
percent  uptime minutes of the monitoring system during the sampling period.

percent of endpoints actively maintained in the asset inventory (appearing in security audit logs).
